courses.title: Blockchain Basics
courses.description: Understand the core concepts of blockchain technology and its applications across industries.

courses.title: Solidity for Beginners
courses.description: Start developing smart contracts on Ethereum using Solidity with hands-on projects.

courses.title: DeFi Essentials
courses.description: Learn how decentralized finance protocols like Uniswap, Aave, and Compound work.

courses.title: NFT Development & Marketplace Setup
courses.description: Create, mint, and list NFTs using tools like OpenSea, IPFS, and Moralis.

courses.title: Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs)
courses.description: Explore the concepts behind zkRollups and their use in Layer 2 scaling on Ethereum.

courses.title: Intro to DAOs
courses.description: Discover how Decentralized Autonomous Organizations work and how to participate or create one.

courses.title: Full-Stack DApp Development
courses.description: Build decentralized applications using Solidity, React.js, Hardhat, and Ethers.js.

courses.title: Web3 Career Bootcamp
courses.description: Learn how to break into Web3, build a portfolio, contribute to open-source, and land jobs.

courses.title: Ethereum & EVM Deep Dive
courses.description: Understand Ethereum architecture, the EVM, gas, and transaction lifecycle.

courses.title: Smart Contract Security
courses.description: Master security vulnerabilities like reentrancy, overflow, and how to audit smart contracts.
